ACCESSIBILITY AND COMPATIBILITY OF BROWSERS

Future Foods pledges to ensure the accessibility of the site for all users.

However, Future Foods does not guarantee permanent access, a lack of interruptions, or the best functioning of our site at all times. In the case of any problems or comments, contact us.

This is site is best accessed using recent versions of the standard internet browsers: Firefox, Safari, Chrome, and Internet Explorer. In addition, it is accessible on mobile phones and tablets using a simpler navigation version that has been adapted for small screens and slow/spotty internet connections.

If you have problems viewing the site, make sure your browser is updated.

This site uses JavaScript for certain functions. Therefore, we recommend that you activate the JavaScript function on your internet browser.

This site uses cookies. For more information on this subject, consult this page “Confidentiality Policy“.
